title: Carla & Schnuu Watch Face Lite
developerAddress:
Timefaces
Danziger Platz 4
60314 Frankfurt am Main
Germany
description: The ever cheerful Carla and her grumpy octopus Schnuu are inseparable. With this watch face you will gain a first insight into the exciting daily routine of the two. Illustrated by the incomparable Melanie Schober, these two chibi figures will not just make Manga Fans smile.Carla & Schnuu Lite includes:- a watch face for smart watches (Android Wear)- a homescreen widget for smart phones
descriptionHTML:
The ever cheerful Carla and her grumpy octopus Schnuu are inseparable. With this watch face you will gain a first insight into the exciting daily routine of the two.

Illustrated by the incomparable Melanie Schober, these two chibi figures will not just make Manga Fans smile.

Carla & Schnuu Lite includes:
- a watch face for smart watches (Android Wear)
- a homescreen widget for smart phones
comments: Love My daughter loved it for her watch great app
Very cute,  works well The artwork is adorable and the clock works perfectly. I prefer circle and auto change designs, but you can pick square or to select your fave design only.

Lucu Banget! Aku suka app ini. Widget jamnya lucu dan gampang disetting juga. Aku bisa milih bentuk jamnya, lingkaran atau persegi. Selain itu juga, gambar latarnya bisa kita ganti sesuai keinginan kita atau dibiarin acak. Coba download deh. Appnya enteng kok.
Carla and Schnuu are adorable. I am always curious to see what they are upto next.
AWESOME APPS! I love it it loads quick and apps is fast
recentChanges: - Shifting lunch time for daily activities
